title: What should search do different by default?

labels.name: question
labels.description: Issue asks a question rather than reporting a problem

body:
@yarikoptic We had quite a few discussions on what to do differently. Given that the `///` is not a viable beast to play with, I decided to take a few datasets from it, reaggregate them and re-published them (without data). I will use this to implement further tests. Moreover, I would be glad to get comments on the default behavior. I give a sample below. Please chime in with your feedback and suggestions.

The following protocol is what is possible after a plain reaggregation, without any change in the dataset configuration.
